required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase I Study of Direct Coagulation Factor Xa Inhibitor SYHA136 Tablets in Chinese Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Single-center, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Single Dose Ascending Trial of SYHA 136 Tablets in Healthy Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock:
The trial used single-center, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, single-dose ascending study.
The trial planned to enroll fifty-six healthy volunteers. The subjects were allocated to eight dose groups, including 0.5 mg (3+1), 1 mg (3+1), 2.5 mg (6+2), 5 mg (6+2), 10 mg (6+2), 20 mg (6+2), 35 mg(6+2) and 50 mg (6+2). Each dose group was allocated test drugs and placebos according to the proportion of subjects in the brackets mentioned above.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: From Screening period to 12 Days Post dose
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants that experience Adverse Events (AEs)

primary_outcome.time_frame: From Screening period to 12 Days Post dose
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants that experience Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
Number of participants with clinically significant laboratory assessment abnormalities
Number of participants with clinically significant 12-lead electrocardiograms (ECGs) abnormalities
Number of participants with clinically significant physical examination abnormalities

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the concentration-time curve from time zero to time of the Last Measurable Concentration (AUC0-tlast)
secondary_outcome.description: PK Assessment - Area Under the concentration-time curve from time zero to time of the Last Measurable Concentration (AUC0-tlast)

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 to infinity (AUCinf)
secondary_outcome.description: PK Assessment - Area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 to infinity (AUCinf)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to reach maximum observed concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.description: PK Assessment - Time to reach maximum observed concentration (Tmax)
PK Assessment - Apparent total body clearance (CL/F)
PK Assessment - Apparent volume of distribution (Vz/F)

secondary_outcome.measure: Amount of SYHA136 excreted in urine (Aeu)
secondary_outcome.description: PK Assessment - Amount of SYHA136 excreted in urine (Aeu)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Cohort 1:SYHA136 0.5 mg or Placebo matching SYHA136 0.5 mg
arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single oral dose of SYHA136 0.5 mg or Placebo matching SYHA136 0.5 mg under fasted conditions.
